rdfgears.util.row
Class ExpressionRow

java.lang.Object
  rdfgears.util.row.AbstractRow<Expression>
      rdfgears.util.row.ExpressionRow
All Implemented Interfaces:
Row<Expression>
public class ExpressionRow
extends AbstractRow<Expression>

A row over Expression objects It is used as input for the RGLFunction execute() call, and for RecordValue implementation. This class is optimized to use as little memory as possible, as the lazy evaluation makes that it can be instantiated many times, and kept in memory until the function is executed.

Author:
Eric Feliksik

clone

public ExpressionRow clone()
Clone this ExpressionRow. That is, make a new instance, with a shallow copy of the interal array of Expression objects, and reference the same RGLFunction.
